ygData.subject: Re: EQ slang (troll alert!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Trolls! Not just from Grobb anymore! Folks, every friday over on the CoN discussion board I drop a troll post in just for fun, the first one was about how
ygData.messageBody:
>From: MrS8N@...



Trolls! Not just from Grobb anymore!

Folks, every friday over on the CoN discussion board I drop a troll post in just for fun, the first
one was about how you should be able to store bind locations in your spellbook (UO Recall
effectivly) the next was about how clerics who didn't heal me when asked (and shamens who didn't
SoW) weren't doing their job :o) the third (under my own name even) was about getting a sex change
operation...*laughs* every time I got people to get hooked, my point it I know about trolling (never
mind all the years on Usenet, when netcom was as reprehensible an address as AOL became later).

Our MrS8N is a troll pure and simple, he is here to stir up an otherwise useful list, to get us all
talking about him. He has little to nothing of value to say, or, if there IS content it is still for
the purpose of causing dischord. For everyones sanity, just ignore him, he is worth it, really.

Tszaaz
